trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected" /> events of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected" /> 控件的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.Action%2A> property to determine which event is occurring.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.Action%2A>属性以确定发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to handle multiple event types with one event handler.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够处理与一个事件处理程序的多个事件类型。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A> properties to determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A>属性来确定哪些<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>有关发生该事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> named `TabControl1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>名为`TabControl1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: 发生的事件所针对的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of <c>tabPage</c> in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages" /> 集合中 <c>tabPage</c> 的索引，此索引为从零开始。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlAction" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlAction" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The property values of the newly created instance are initialized to the specified parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的实例的属性值将初始化为指定的参数值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating which event is occurring.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlAction" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlAction" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> named `TabControl1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>名为`TabControl1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: 获取发生的事件所针对的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: 发生的事件所针对的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based index of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage" /> in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages" /> collection.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage" /> 集合中 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages" /> 的从零开始的索引。
